unnormalised: Boro, konnem tori vicharlem Bharotantlea emergency room-an kam korop *khorem* koxem asta mhonn. Kamar kas bandun toiar ravat, beta testers, kiteak tem sodanch tumi TV-cher pollaita toxem nashta.
normalised: Boro, konnem tori vicharlem Bharotantlea emergency room-an kam korop khorench koxem asta mhunn. Kemar kas dhorat, beta testers, kiteak tem sodanch tumi T-V-cher polletat toxem nasta.
text: Boro, konnem tori vicharlem Bharotantlea emergency room-an kam korop *khorem* koxem asta mhonn. Kamar kas bandun toiar ravat, beta testers, kiteak tem sodanch tumi TV-cher pollaita toxem nashta.

unnormalised: Pehle mhuntat tache visrun voch, eka golliek lagun ghayal zalele lok natakantlean bhitor sortat. Na, bhai. Amkam veg-vegllea toreche lok mellttat. "Mhaka kal saun pott dukhta" mhunn ratchea 2 vaztam ieupi lok (ho khorench) tem khorea, devachem nanv gheun sangta tea bhaxen zatiche apatkaleen sthitik sampoddlole lok. Ani kedna kedna tankam 1998 saun survat zaun 20 minuteam tanchea pachanche problem aile tea vixim aikun zalea uprantuch difference kalloita. Mhaka ekdam ek zon bhitor ailo kiteak taka dislem taka *paper cut* asa mhunn. Paper cut! Tem itlen dhaktulem aslem. Mhojem chai-chem addiction poryant ek vhodd apatkaleen sthiti asonk xakta, tbh.
normalised: सबसे पयलीं, एकेच गोळी मारून भितर येवपी नाटकी प्रवेश विसरून वचात. ना, भय. आमकां एक स्पेक्ट्रम मेळटा. दोन ए-एम वता मेरेन "म्हाका काल सावन पोट दुखता" म्हणपी लोकांची गर्दी (खरोखर) ते खऱ्या, देव-दियेल्ल्या आणीबाणी मेरेन. आनी केन्ना केन्ना, खूब कठीण जाता फरक कळपाक जो मेरेन तुमी एक हजार णवशे नव्वद आट मेरेन तांच्या पचन संस्थेच्या दोषांचो सविस्तर इतिहास आयकून वीस मिनटां खर्च करिनात. म्हाका एक मनीस आयलो कारण ताका दिसलें ताका कागदाचो घाव जाला म्हणून. कागदाचो घाव! तो सूक्ष्म आशिल्लो. म्हाजें चायेचें व्यसन चड व्हडली आणीबाणी आसत, खरें सांगल्यार.
text: Pehle mhuntat tache visrun voch, eka golliek lagun ghayal zalele lok natakantlean bhitor sortat. Na, bhai. Amkam veg-vegllea toreche lok mellttat. "Mhaka kal saun pott dukhta" mhunn ratchea 2 vaztam ieupi lok (ho khorench) tem khorea, devachem nanv gheun sangta tea bhaxen zatiche apatkaleen sthitik sampoddlole lok. Ani kedna kedna tankam 1998 saun survat zaun 20 minuteam tanchea pachanche problem aile tea vixim aikun zalea uprantuch difference kalloita. Mhaka ekdam ek zon bhitor ailo kiteak taka dislem taka *paper cut* asa mhunn. Paper cut! Tem itlen dhaktulem aslem. Mhojem chai-chem addiction poryant ek vhodd apatkaleen sthiti asonk xakta, tbh.

unnormalised: ani tya uprant nidani korpache avhan asat. amchem MRI machin, tachi dev bori karu, "nityachi dekhbhal" mhunn bond asunk xakta (vachat: technician ek festak apllya ganvant gela). mhunn tum tumchi clinical acumen, tumchem stethoscope, ani koxem tori bhag divo mhunn asun tumchea seniorencher adharit asa zo kednam tori aplyea 36vy horanche shifter astolo. ekdam halthalea hatamni ECG koxi vachat! kall raati, doctor Sharman ek bore bhagyeche monshak stage 4 kitem tori asa mhunn nidan korpachem aslem. dislem, machina punha recalibrate korpachi goroz asli!
normalised: Ani magir diagnostic challenges asat. Amchi M-R-I machine, tichea purannea atmeak borem korum, "routine maintenance" khatir band asunk xakta (vachat: technician aplea ganvant ek festak gela). Techak lagun, tumi tumchea clinical acumenacher, tumchea stethoscope-acher, ani kiteak zait ek bhagivant guess-acher adharit asat. Oh, ani tumchea senior resident-achem collective wisdom zanchem prayashaha tees-shest hem shift asunk xakta. Dhadosh E-C-G dolle dhukon interpret korpak! Kal, Doctor Sharma-n eka purnnrupak bore aslolea patientak Stage char kitei-tor-kitei asa mhunn diagnose korchea laga aslo. Disun ailem, machine-ak recalibration-achi goroz asli!
text: Ani tanntunt diagnostics-acheo addchnni astaat. Amchem MRI machine, tachea pornea atmak dev borem korum, "routine maintenance"-akhatir band asta (mhannlear: technician aplea ganvak ek festak gela). Mhunn tuka tujjea clinical acumen-acher, stethoscope-acher ani kiteak nhui ek lucky guess-acher adharit ravonk poddta. Oh, ani tujjea senior residentachem collective wisdom zaka sumar 36 horancho shift asa. Thirthirtea hatamni tem ECG interpret korunk bore borem! Kal, Dr. Sharma-n eka boreponnan aslolea patientak Stage 4 kitem torui mhunn diagnose kelolem. Punn tem machine recalibrate korunk zai aslem!

unnormalised: Ani chala kagadpatri vixim uloiya. Kitli-kitli kagadpatri. Hem ashem asa ki ami eklleanuch kagad udyogak jivo dovortat. Tumkam soglleanchem daktarik karanvachem asa. Ek-ek koslo-ui khonkli, ek-ek shik, ek-ek dubhavit purall. "Rogiak dukham-dukhi 14:30 vorancher suru zali mhunn sangta. Tap naslo mhunn sangta. Jiveache dekhave sthir asat." Mhaka dil'lho ghevun sangchem, hanv rogiak ilaz korche poros chodd vell boroyant kaddta. Mhoji borpavoll itli vait zalea ki ti svota: ek hatapayak lagpachea vellar uprant-i astali.
normalised: Ani aami kagda patra vixim uloya. Kitlem. Kagda patra. Tem oxem asa ami ekleanuch kagad udyog doryant samballtat. Tumi dor ek gosht dakhlo korunk zai. Dor ek khokli, dor ek chink, dor ek shakye ashi phunsgi. "Rogi sangta tankam duparyam don vortam ani tis minutam xer dolduk laglem. Tap naslo mhunta. Jivachi chinna thir-ish asat." Hanv sopon dita, rogyanchi chikitsa korunche poros hanv boraytan tim xer veglim. Mhojem akshar atam itlem vaait zalam ki tem svata:ch ek aadkalik paristhiti zatali.
text: Ani chala kagadpatri vixim uloiya. Kitli-kitli kagadpatri. Hem ashem asa ki ami eklleanuch kagad udyogak jivo dovortat. Tumkam soglleanchem daktarik karanvachem asa. Ek-ek koslo-ui khonkli, ek-ek shik, ek-ek dubhavit purall. "Rogiak dukham-dukhi 14:30 vorancher suru zali mhunn sangta. Tap naslo mhunn sangta. Jiveache dekhave sthir asat." Mhaka dil'lho ghevun sangchem, hanv rogiak ilaz korche poros chodd vell boroyant kaddta. Mhoji borpavoll itli vait zalea ki ti svota: ek hatapayak lagpachea vellar uprant-i astali.

unnormalised: punn itti saty hanga asa, gondoll ani dukhnya pachi pida madhyen (dhanyavad, sosnyache hospital bed!), ashe kshan asta jithe tumka khorench ek vir zalyashiri dista. jedhna tumhi eka road accident zalele bacheak sambhallta (Rs. 2000 helmetan tacho jiv vachaila asto), va jedhna tumhi chupchap ayilolo heart attack bara waktar pakdhta. te kshan hanche lagin sab dakhla devak yoge asta. hya lagin, ho thodo pagalyashiri, thodo mailashiri, ani bahut thakloile ashe, punn ho duniya talo boro cam karta. tumche hasyache sens, mazbut mutrakosh, ani kadachit jivanbhar purel etlye chai gheun ya. tumka ti lagteli.
normalised: poon punn sot mhonnlear, gondoll ani kalljik dukhi (dhonnvad, trasdivpi hospitalanchi nhidpachi suvat!), aslelea vellar tuka khorench ek hero bhaxen dista. jevhann tuka eka road accident zalea uprant tea bhurgeak sthir karta (don hozar rupianchea helmetan taka zaddaila astolo), vo jevhann tunve eka hushar naslelea heart attackak vellarodden zaddta. tim mhonlllear tuka khushi divpache vellar. tor, ho thoddo pagol, thoddo gandall ani zaiti thako divpi, punn to ekdam boreantle bore kam mhonnllear chuknna. tumche haspachem mon, ek ghott mootkosh ani zaitich chai gheun ieo. tumkam tachi goroz poddli.
text: punn itti saty hanga asa, gondoll ani dukhnya pachi pida madhyen (dhanyavad, sosnyache hospital bed!), ashe kshan asta jithe tumka khorench ek vir zalyashiri dista. jedhna tumhi eka road accident zalele bacheak sambhallta (Rs. 2000 helmetan tacho jiv vachaila asto), va jedhna tumhi chupchap ayilolo heart attack bara waktar pakdhta. te kshan hanche lagin sab dakhla devak yoge asta. hya lagin, ho thodo pagalyashiri, thodo mailashiri, ani bahut thakloile ashe, punn ho duniya talo boro cam karta. tumche hasyache sens, mazbut mutrakosh, ani kadachit jivanbhar purel etlye chai gheun ya. tumka ti lagteli.
